website_summaries.verdict: Your toddler can steer, drive, and dance along with Mickey with this ride-on toy, featuring the iconic mouse's favorite songs and spinning propellers.
pros: Buttons on dashboard engage your child in interactive play
Includes control handle which triggers lift-off and landing sounds
cons: May be a bit small for larger children
Handle does not adjust for pushing

customer_reviews.title: My 8 month old loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Best infant ride on toy! Purchased for my 6 month old to grow into and it’s one of his favorite toys (he is now 8 months so we’ve had it for about 2 months) The propeller with lights is a great touch to the standard ride on toys. The only thing I wish was that the seat opened up like other ride on toys do. This would be a great present for ages 8 months - 18 months as it is on the small side! I included a video of my 8 month old playing on it. I’ll add he is on the taller side (95th percentile for height).
customer_reviews.author: Bri S

customer_reviews.title: All children were absolutely delighted with this gift.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these products for my cousins and grandchildren. I had some grandchildren visiting me, when we went to my daughters house, the airplane was a hit with the youngest three children. The very next birthday coming up I chose the Mickey Mouse one because the little one that was excited about it was a boy. Give me a great gift and was a hit with a one-year-old female cousin. My granddaughter absolutely loves it. I believe it’s her favorite toy. She’s going somewhere when she’s on it I have no idea where, but she’s going with purse inhand.
customer_reviews.author: lynne72

customer_reviews.title: My sons love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, makes fun sounds and lights up. By far my twin sons favorite Christmas present! They’ve been fighting over it since opening it!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: All else seems good. The lights on the propellor was the main ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves the toy. But after 1 1/2 weeks of infrequent use the lights on the propellor no longer function. All else seems good. The lights on the propellor was the main attraction for my grandson. Does anyone know how to fix the problem?
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My 8 month old loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 8 month old loves this toy!! Very easy to put together, just have to put the blue handle on the back. The rest came pre-assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: MIckey Mouse in the House
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy. It feels kind of cheap and is smaller than the Minnie Mouse one we got my daughter a few years ago. My kids love the spinning propellers in the front. The propellers are made of a soft material and stop when they are touched. Nice toy, just wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: DBrown

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I purchased this plane for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: My great-nephew loved this toy. I think it was the hit of the party. He really loved the propeller. The buttons that made noise were interesting to him a well. He just turned 1, but he is already trying to move the plane around with his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robin E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy received as a Christmas gift from his Uncle. It was one of his favorite presents, he loves all the buttons, lights and the moving propeller. It's sturdy and well made. He's a big kid for his age at 18 months, closer in size to an average 3 year old but the plane is good for him and even at 30 plus pounds he has plenty of room before he hits the weight limit. He prefers it to the VTech ride and push type train we got him for his birthday. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: It meets the age suggestions.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 22 month old grandsons favorite toy since he opened it on Christmas. He is small for his age and fits him perfectly and should for sometime. The lights and sound effects are a plus. Optional stickers are included to dress it up as a Disney toy. Nice having that option. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl K

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The "blades" on the front are foam, so won't hurt the child. My one year old stuck his hand in it and it stopped easily and didn't hurt him at all. Seat is wide. Turns very easily. When the blades are turning in the front, it's kind of loud, but not terrible. My three year old uses it more than the one year old though. It comes with more stickers to put on it, I didn't really understand why they weren't already put on there.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Not at all suitable for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed by this purchase . This looks cute but sutable for less than 2 year. Those wings makes it little clumsy for kid to move legs. No enough room to move legs back n forth so that vehicle can go forward fast. Also the provided stearing wheel does not turn vehicle right or left.kid have to drag it.height could have been little more n seat could have been little long for better play. I am repenting my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pallavi S

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 15 mo old son and it's probably the best toy we've purchased for any of our kids up to this point. It is a little smaller than expected as some other reviews mentioned, but it's perfect for the 1 - 3 yr old age group that you're probably looking to purchase it for anyways. Perfect size for them to sit on and also push around with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very cute airplane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who turned 2. This is so cute and he absolutely loved it. The only issue I had is that it is short and small. It needs to be about 2 inches higher. There is also a piece in the back that drags on the floor and doesn't seem necessary. Overall, it is a fun toy .I love the sounds and the propeller that moves. I just think he will grow out of it sooner rather than later.
customer_reviews.author: ohionana

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves this toy. He is happy with it and I suppose that's all that really matters. However, I am unhappy because the propeller at the front is already broken and we have only had it a few weeks. It is suppose to spin and light up when certain buttons are pushed. It has already stopped doing that. To spend 50 bucks on a product only for certain parts to wear out in less than a month is very disappointing imo.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Domanski

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so disappointed with an Amazon product like this. The product came damaged and looks to been used. Stickers are peeling, the mickey mouse on the side is missing paint, there is a black smudge on the side and hot glue stuck to the plastic. NOT WORTH THE MONEY. I should have listened to previous reviews. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty is best adversary

customer_reviews.title: Trash used equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is the first purchase that I have to write a negative review about. I received this Mickey ride on for my son, when I opened it, it looked as if it was used? The paint was already off the plastic all the stickers were put on it and it didn’t even come in the box. I am very disappointed in this purchase and was a waste of 45$ and it doesn’t even drive. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Beware of various models and features!
customer_reviews.text: According to the description, the plane was supposed to play the Mickey Mouse March, but the one that arrived makes sounds, but doesn’t play music. Disappointed, but not a deal breaker. Just be aware that there are many planes like this with different features. You may not get the model you’re expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute. Smaller than I expected but I am pleasantly happy due to the fact that I bought this as a Christmas present for my grandson and he is only 5 months old! The noises and lights are so cute! I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly small and just not as functional as other models for the same price or cheaper. This is buying the Mickey brand but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but small.
customer_reviews.text: Sensory overload, the perpellors spin and plays music and has lights but it's very small. But it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Bloozier

customer_reviews.title: Will no longer work after 1 month and no one stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: This product broke within the first month, and nothing works anymore. The buttons, propeller everything broke with in a month of having it. And it breaks just time that you cannot return the shotty product. Very disappointing. They don't even stand behind their product. I would never buy again! It is a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: No good, stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected. It worked fine the first month. My son has had this for 2 months now and it stopped working !!! I put brand new batteries in and nothing works anymore, the fan doesn’t spin, the lights don’t work and neither do the sounds. So disappointed. I give it two stars because it worked at first and it was easy to assemble but so disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Grisel G

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: The best gift for 2 year old. My second purchase. Lots of buttons to push and make sounds and the propeller is very fun. Easy to tide on or push
customer_reviews.author: nini2

customer_reviews.title: great learning toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my 9 month old grandson. His is a bit young for this toy but it his helping him learn balance and how to steady himself. He loves this toy. He has learned to hang on the the steering wheel to help him steady himself and now he has learned that there are fun buttons on it. When was first on it you had to help him stay on it and now after a few weeks he can balance himself. I bet by the end of next month he will be riding it all by himself!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Super cute Mickey Mouse airplane. And I had read on the comments that someone’s child did climb on it and used it as a store. My son also did the same thing you use it as a store to try to unlock the doors. But it is really cute and I trusted you so very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKumar

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great gift for my nephew! It is a little small though so keep that in mind he will still be able to use it but it is a little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Lights stopped working on propeller
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this plane, but after using it for a few weeks, the lights on the propeller stopped working. Anybody else having this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Terri Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest rode on toy I’ve ever seen! Instant hit with 1 year old grandson & his parents. Buy it - You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaWil

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE LOVE LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I love that it doesn't make a ton of annoying noises and my kids are entertained for hours. No assembly required except for the pull handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: My Grandsons Loved This
customer_reviews.text: Enough moving parts to keep them interested. Easy to get on and ride. They also loved pushing it from behind. Great toy for ages 10 months to 20 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne R. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and clever
customer_reviews.text: So far there is nothing to dislike about this cute toy- our grandson who just turned one just loves it! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Mouse Ride-On Plane
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1 year old grandson. He loves it & is fascinated by the turning propeller. Loves the sides & riding on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama C

customer_reviews.title: No music.
customer_reviews.text: Saw other Videos got Mickey Mouse music, But my plane no song. Just annoying noise.
customer_reviews.author: kimheng

customer_reviews.title: Good toy but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons first birthday. He loves it but I Definitely did not see 62 Dollars worth of Toy !! Great toy but not for the price !
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my friends son for his first birthday after my niece received one as a gift for her first birthday. Love it! Super cute and both kids love theirs!
customer_reviews.author: EMMom

customer_reviews.title: Propeller doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Everything works except for the propeller. Ugh. I need this for my son's birthday this week, so I hope the replacement comes in on time. If it does, and everything works, I will edit my review. As of right now, I'm disappointed in this product. Why didn't they do a quality check on it before sending it out??
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Old version was better
customer_reviews.text: Very fun! But old version was better— it used to have a flip up seat to load with blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Great grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandson. He loves it. The smile on his face is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Burns

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: perfect toy for my 1 yr old nephew. He is a huge Mickey fan! this helicopter lives up to the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but missing some paint/color on steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's first birthday. He hasn't received it yet, because his birthday isn't until next month. It looks cute and was easy to assemble and place the stickers. However, it does like used even though I bought new. The steering wheel has parts losing it's black color as seen in picture. Should be an easy fix with black nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young grandson
customer_reviews.text: Great for 9 month old , loves the lights and noises, so realistic. Makes walking fun!
customer_reviews.author: M.R. Wiertel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a little one to scoot around
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson has this at home. He’s 1 year and not quite walking so scoots around on this like a champ!! We purchased one to take on vacation so he could keep up with his 3 year old brother!! Now we keep the extra at our house. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jim/golf

customer_reviews.title: Nephew’s favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old nephew loves this thing SO MUCH! He plays with it for hours, riding it, pushing it, playing all the sounds. I have never seen him play with any other toy this much.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great nephew and he absolutely loved it! It’s adorable
customer_reviews.author: Denise J.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds! My son loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors! Great sounds! My son loves this toy! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: It was as said however it was smaller than I expected my grandson is a small 2 year old he will out grow this within a few months. He loves the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Estacee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves this. He's 16 months but the size of a two year old. Tons of lights and sounds. Had it a few months now and no durability issues. Going to last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Everything a little tyke would like!!!
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required--besides the stickers. Super cute and nephew LOVED it as soon as he opened it Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Dee d

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks! My son really likes it! He likes mickey mouse and its a perfect gift on his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Ysabel

customer_reviews.title: This toy was perfect for a birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This toy was perfect for a birthday gift. It was easy to assemble (just had to put the blue handle on it) and it worked perfectly. The little boy that received this gift was very excited.
customer_reviews.author: sara komisarz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great birthday present for a little one who loves Mickey Mouse. 👍🏻 I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sheirer

customer_reviews.title: Paying high price for  for  Disney character
customer_reviews.text: Over price item....only took half day my son lost his Interest
customer_reviews.author: Sunmy yoo

customer_reviews.title: The lights and sounds just made it more amazing. I liked that the wings of the plane ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my nephews, who are both celebrating their first birthdays. They were so excited to see Mickie Mouse flying a plane. The lights and sounds just made it more amazing. I liked that the wings of the plane can be folded up when stored.
customer_reviews.author: Marion M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his plane. He uses it as a walker on his own and when we sit him on it, he has this huge smile on his face.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this. My 13 month old grandson finds it easy to sit on without falling off. It close to the ground easy to push and bonus the propeller moves and the sound effects are awsome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Smiles all around!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves his gift! That makes a grandma happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent the item missing important part.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson’s 1st Birthday and it came missing the back rest handle. So disappointed. He loves the propeller though.
customer_reviews.author: cmar62

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toy my grandson had a fit over this toy the propeller really works .great gift too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect... My nephew loves it and I'm so glad I found it
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and I opened the box expecting to have to assemble. To my surprise and delight it was assembled, even the stickers are all in place. My 10 month old loves it. The propeller spins and lights up, his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Travis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product made good. Got it for my Grandson, he's one. He loves Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.author: Gail Pusch

customer_reviews.title: Paint rubbed off
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item! It’s so cute! The only reason why I’m Giving it a low rating is the steering wheel color rubbed off on the box. It has two big white spots where the paint rubbed off. This just concerns me that it will happen more as it ages!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Loeven

customer_reviews.title: Great ride!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and functionality! My son loves to play with all the buttons and he loves the light that the propellor has!
customer_reviews.author: Pichis4u07

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for his 1st birthday and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... years old it’s looks to small for him maybe better for a child that just turned 1 years old ...
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than expected but cute My grandson is 2 years old it’s looks to small for him maybe better for a child that just turned 1 years old 😩
customer_reviews.author: Cristal B.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas and he plays with it constantly! Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: hockey mom 22

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves this Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sound is great, propeller is safe and very entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Organ Grinder

customer_reviews.title: No off switch
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have an off switch!! That being said my son loves this plane.
customer_reviews.author: M Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my nephew, he seems to like it, seems nice, not too loud. As for durability we will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable airplane!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it and it’s well made . Great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy ever
customer_reviews.text: I babysit a little boy who has played with this ride on toy since he was about 10 months old. It is his favorite toy and plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P Stevens

customer_reviews.title: My grandchild had a fit of joy when he saw this
customer_reviews.text: My grandchild had a fit of joy when he saw this! He received it as his 1st birthday gift and it was a hit! I was so happy to see his reaction.
customer_reviews.author: trparrish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first birthday gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a one year old and he and his family love it! The sound effects, spinning soft propeller, etc. are superb.
customer_reviews.author: Patty P

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it - sturdy as can be.
customer_reviews.text: The two-year-old still hasn't broken it a year later - excellent toy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Childs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new walkers!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew won’t let anyone else ride on it because he loves it so much! Fun and sturdy toy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hanson

customer_reviews.title: SAFE and AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. Very child friendly and safe. The spinning prop blades are awesome. Soft plastic/foam. Child is able to grab them and not get injured. It’s an awesome gift for that little pilot if yours.
customer_reviews.author: Johnette K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson's first birthday. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sun2Shine

customer_reviews.title: Grangkids loved it but i don't know how long it will last. A high price for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson for his 1st birthday and had a hard time getting his 3 yr old sister to share his present with him. They both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: This little air plane is super cute and easy to assemble. My 1 year old nephew loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Fun ride on very durable Mickey Mouse plane.
customer_reviews.text: Fun ride on toy which our boys consistently use each day to ride on. If a child loves airplanes, they will love this ride on toy. My twin grandsons gave thoroughly enjoyed this ride on Mickey plane. One if best purchases I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love it! I only wish it was a little larger in size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining plane, music, lights and propeller spinning. All play with it. From 7 y.o to 1 y.e
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Super fun ride on for our twins. They love the propeller and it can’t hurt them. Great shipping packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy but really small
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that is really small in size. My 1 year old won't be riding this long.
customer_reviews.author: GlamourGirl@heart

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for our great nephews 1st birthday and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our great nephews 1st birthday and he loves it. Lots of action with the lights, music and propeller. He was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old granddaughter loves her plane! Her dad is a pilot and works in air traffic control.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Was the highlight of the party and they love it. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my 18 month old grandson and one year little guy I nanny for. Was the highlight of the party and they love it. Great product. More than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Light Up Propeller and Features!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son got this for his birthday and loves it! The propeller lights up and spins, the wings fold up on the sides for easier storage, and the buttons make fun noises and songs. My 6 year old twins even enjoy this toy, and always want to ride it. It does seem fairly sturdy, however, it is somewhat small. Perfect for 1-2 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 16 month old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My little one is a big Mickey fan so needless to say when he saw the plane he was excited. Everything worked great and the propeller spinning was pretty cool. Would recommend if your child is into Mickey. Arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My grandson plays with his plane all the time. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be used to help walk or as a riding toy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a definite hit with my grandchildren from age 13 months to almost three years. Although clearly for the younger age group, it has enough lights and sounds to engage the older children as well. Can be used to ride or as a push toy for those learning to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Admiral El

customer_reviews.title: My grandson love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would order again, I love this, my grandson loves this toy, fast shipment!
customer_reviews.author: HillbillyWillys Bar-B-Q

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and thought out.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. Very clever toy and works well. I like the sounds...I mean, he does.
customer_reviews.author: crash56

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this toy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson absolutely loves this ride on airplane. Wheels really turn with steering wheel. Lights and sounds with working propeller! Highly recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: JP&KG

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Birthday gift for one yo grandson, he loved it & so did his 4 yo sister & cousins. The multi colored lights on the soft spinning propeller were captivating.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: 😂 best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: When my husband opened the box to this, my 15 month old son started to scream from excitement. 😂 best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Simone WS

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this would end up being too small for my almost 2 y.o.! I was happily wrong! The features (sounds, lights,especially the spinning propeller) keep him entertained!
customer_reviews.author: AndreaC

customer_reviews.title: All kids would love the lights,sounds,and working propeller!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it , was the best ride on toy ever! Got it for my grandson for Christmas at 10 months old and he loves it ! His mom said it was his favorite toy ! Easy on and off and scoots it along with his feet!!
customer_reviews.author: LaNel Shires

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Kid loves it! Less annoying than similar toys and the spinning propeller is so fun and different!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking ride on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loves this
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Torres

product_meta.title: Kiddieland Disney Mickey Mouse Plane Light & Sound Activity Ride-On
product_meta.description: Ride on the Mickey Plane as Mickey moves to the music. Enjoy the Mickey Mouse March Song, delightful music and radio frequency sounds. Shifting gears and revving sound. Realistic landing & lift off sound. Propellers rotate to amazing light up patterns. 2AA batteries, included.
feature_bullets: Mickey Mouse March Song, delightful music, & radio frequency sounds
Realistic landing & lift off sound Propellers rotate to amazing light up patterns

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars694 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
